TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SamlStatement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 安全令牌的声明。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定何时对主题进行身份验证。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示，这些语句由 类表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements, which are represented by the class. SAML 规范定义以下语句类型：The SAML specification defines the following statement types: - - - -

summary.span: 为 安全令牌创建授权策略。

span.span: Creates an authorization policy for a security token.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示 安全令牌的授权策略。

span.span: An that represents an authorization policy for the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可获取 安全令牌的授权策略。Use the method to get an authorization policy for a security token.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，从指定的 XML 读取器读取 SAML 语句。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, reads the SAML statement from the specified XML reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可读取 SAML 语句、验证 XML 以及设置对应于属性 (Attribute) 和元素的相应属性 (Property)。Use the method to read in a SAML statement, validate the XML, and set the appropriate properties that correspond to the attributes and elements.
